LanguageData.CoveredUglyNullifier.SettingFullCoverage: Requires coverage of: FullHead, UpperHead, Neck, Shoulders, Torso, Legs, Arms.
LanguageData.CoveredUglyNullifier.SettingDisfiguredCa: Pawns get a negative social opinion for scars or missing parts. When enabled, that disfigured opinion is suppressed if the pawn is covered.
LanguageData.CoveredUglyNullifier.SettingPrettyNullif: Pawns get a positive social opinion for beauty. When enabled, that pretty opinion is suppressed if the pawn is covered.
LanguageData.CoveredUglyNullifier.SettingRestartNote: Some settings require a game restart.
